software.name: pcmag9212
software.notes: Disk 1 and 2 include a pack of utilities for Windows 3.x

software.name: pcplus9206
software.notes: Disk 1 includes: "Symphony 2.2", "Textart", "Shorties", "Chess Puzzle", "Highway Code", "Lotus Smart Suite" Disk 2 includes: ""

software.name: pcplus9305
software.notes: Disk includes: "Type Plus": Windows utility for creating your own word designs and logos that can be exported into many graphic and document programs. This useful program (from Serif - the makers of PagePlus) illustrates only some of the features of the full version. "WormWorld": Delightful series of puzzles for Windows; the object is to guide a worm safely through an assault course; can you get it past the obstacles? All the puzzles can be solved. "Magazine": From this month's issue of PC Plus we have the third part of the Video Library project written in Visual Basic 2 (for Windows). From Programmers' Workshop a trio of programs: TBM and SHUFFLE in Basic, and SHOWSIZE in assembly language and COM form.

software.name: pcplus9409
software.notes: Disk includes: "Locoscript Professional 2 Plus": Create your own documents (one-page limit) using this version of the classic word processor. "SinkSub": Windows game in which your frigate, armed with depth charges, must evade and destroy the enemy's best fleet of submarines. "Magazine": Various files, macros, bits and pieces from Help Screen. Use Basic's Draw command from Wilf's Programmers' Workshop. A project and a new utility from Visual Basic Workshop.

software.name: pcplus9504
software.notes: Disk includes: "Medi8or Entree 2.0": A complete commercial multimedia authoring package. Create your own presentations, and enter the PC Plus competition! "DOS Bar 1.31": Add a handy toolbar to DOS applications running under Windows. "Roblist UK BBS Listing": Comprehensive listing of UK bulletin boards, plus ftp sites and other interesting Internet locations. "From PC PLUS Magazine": Files from this month's Hands On section, including Help Screen, Visual Basic Workshop and Wilf's Programmers' Workshop.

software.name: pcr199205
software.notes: Disk includes: "Another World (demo)", "Time Lord (demo)", "Aces of the Pacific (preview pictures)"

software.name: pcr199311
software.notes: Disk includes: "Ancients: Death Watch (demo)"

software.name: pctod9212
software.notes: Disk 1 includes: "GST TimeWorks Publisher Lite v1.01" Disk 2 includes: "Cliparts for TimeWorks Publisher Lite", "Wessex Systems Mail-Pro 2.01", "PC Today Buyer's Guide", "SysEdit"

software.name: pcw9404
software.notes: Cover Disk includes: Amour-Geddon (part 2) [Psygnosis]: Part 2 of this blockbuster game adds brilliant animation to the program's startup sequence. Marketeer [Sterling Data]: All the features anyone involved in marketing could ask for. A superb, easy-to-use system. Walking Fingers [David Geffen]: Let your fingers do the walking in this handy mini-database. Fun, logical and good graphics.

software.name: pcw9406
software.notes: Cover Disk includes: Programmer's File Editor: A multi-featured, multi-file programming editor for Windows 3.1. Win Crabs: Invade someone's desktop with roving crabs. An amusing desktop curio. Dropper: Drop programs AND data files where you like. Add extra drag and drop facilities to your Windows desktop. Win Life: Study the way primitive organisms may develop. Run a implementation of the classic simulation. Speaker Driver: Play WAV files on your ordinary PC speaker. Play Windows 3.1 sounds through your PC's internal speaker. Waxman 1.2w: Play chess with yourself, a friend or the PC.

software.name: pcw9411
software.notes: Cover Disk includes: "World Rally Fever (demo)"

software.name: pcw9705
software.notes: Cover Disk includes: Free the music! v1.01: Not a keyboard in sight, but you can explore all the MIDI features of your computer by pointing with your mouse. Guaranteed to give you hours of fun! Bombs: An amusing little desktop game.
